name: Abyss [NaNoReNo 2019 ver]
description:
I couldn’t see, couldn’t hear, couldn’t move, couldn’t feel.

What is this place? How did I get here, and why?

How can I answer these questions if I don’t remember anything?

The only memory I have is...

Abyss is a mystery/drama story that combines various elements of visual novels, point-and-click* adventures, puzzle-solving games, as well as a few specialised game mechanics**. It is inspired by the Danganronpa and Zero Escape series.

The NaNoRenO 2019 version is a demo, which covers the story up to the Tutorial sections. It aims to introduce players to our game’s concept. As such, some core mechanics will not be available yet.

*Point-and-click feature not implemented in the NaNoRenO 2019 demo.
**Specialised game mechanics not entirely implemented in the NaNoRenO 2019 demo.

Features

The NaNoRenO 2019 Demo Edition features:

  • Up to 25,000 words; 
  • Several puzzles to puzzle over;
  • Various areas and interest points to explore, examine, and get lost in;
  • Interesting characters to chat and complain about things with;*
  • A relationship system that affects how much of the story you do (or don’t) mess up;**
  • A ton of original assets, brought to you by our lovely team! See Other Credits for more information!
  • A good ol’ cliffhanger!

* Only a few segments of this mechanic will appear in the Demo Edition.

Who are we?

Greetings, everyone!

We are the Abyss Team, a group of writers, programmers, artists, and audio people from around the globe who are enthusiastic about developing unique and immersive narratives.
Although some of our members have done a few game jams together, this is Abyss Team’s first NaNoRenO. We can’t wait to have you play our game!
